conbody.p: This section contains release notes for Eucalyptus version 3.2.1.
conbody.note: There is an issue with the current Eucalyptus EMC SAN adapter in both 3.2.0 and 3.2.1. The EMC SAN adapter, when used in a cluster with two or more Node Controllers, has issues with EBS instances that have EBS volumes attached. These deployments are likely to incur data losses. Do not configure and use Eucalyptus in this manner. For more information, see the entry for EUCA-4872 in .
